name: Enemies Foreign and Domestic Quiz | 'West Wing' - Season 3 | 10 Questions

questions.text: Who gave CJ the information on the fire in Medea?
questions.explanation:
Carol.

	Sam and Toby were with CJ when Carol brought the information for CJ to read about the fire in Medea that killed seventeen girls who weren't allowed to come out into the streets to safety.

questions.text: Sam told CJ and Toby that his jokes were funny.
questions.explanation:
False.

	Toby told CJ and Sam that his jokes were funny after he made one about NATO.

questions.text: How many time zones did the President have to fly through to get to Helsinki?
questions.explanation:
7.

	Sam made this point because he mentioned the President's bad response to jet lag and "any trip 8 hours or longer and someone gets fired at the end of it, and it's already been me three times."

questions.text: When CJ began to get death threats on her e-mail, who did Donna call?
questions.explanation:
Josh.

	Josh had a meeting with Secret Service and they gave CJ a Secret Service detail to be with her twenty-four hours a day until they caught the person making threats.

questions.text: Was the death threat CJ received from Muslim extremists?
questions.explanation:
No.

	Ron Butterfield told CJ that Muslim extremists don't send death threats to one individual because they go after groups. Whoever sent death threats to CJ weren't sending them because of her speech at the press briefing.

questions.text: What country wanted Sam to donate his brain to them?
questions.explanation:
Grenada.

	Sam: "I got a letter last year asking me if I would donate my brain to a medical school in Grenada. I'll tell you, there are days when I think, 'Yeah, why not just get it over with'?"

questions.text: Finish this statement by President Bartlet: "If the White House screws up _______ before breakfast, it was a good morning".
questions.explanation:
Twice.

	The President was referring to the recall of 80 million computer chips that could sink a computer company and comparing it to the problems that the White House has on a daily basis.

questions.text: President Bartlet copied his five digit mail code from which former President?
questions.explanation:
Roosevelt.

	President Bartlet said it was an homage to President Roosevelt.

questions.text: Who starred as Secret Service Agent Simon Donovan?
questions.explanation:
Mark Harmon.

	Mark Harmon starred in four episodes of "The West Wing". He was nominated for his role as Simon Donovan, but didn't win.

questions.text: When CJ asked Simon how far away he could be and still protect her, Simon said he wouldn't need to see her naked.
